entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 25 February 2023
